page.title: 16Beacock's Farm
page.content: Mr. Beacock is the owner of Highfield Farm which is situated on the Stallingborough Road side of Immingham.The farm is about 200 years old and there is one tied cottage on the farm. The area covered is approximately 500 acres and the crops are as follows: Wheat.......200 acres Barley......160 acres Peas.........30 acres Beans........30 acres Oil seed rape.....60 acres Sprouts......40 acres Grass........60 acres The grassland is reserved for a riding school and stables. There are two full-time employees but in the harvest season there are up to three casual workers . (continued)
